entries.journal_entry_description: Johnson Smith has requested your help in calming down newly arrived salt addict, Ryoo Finn.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Ryoo Finn has been somewhat agitated over the last few days. Johnson asks that you help him with whatever is bothering him.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Ryoo lost his stash of salt when he wandered too close to some mouf dens. Find his salt for him.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Bring Ryoo's stash of salt to Johnson Smith. He'll know how to handle the situation.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Bring Ryoo's Salt to Johnson Smith
